text:
Because the yield of 1.5% is calculated as the add-on yield for 100 days times
100 / 360, the 100-day holding period return is 1.5% x 100 / 360 = 0.4167%.
The effective annual yield is 1.004167365/100 -1 = 1.5294%, the equivalent
semiannual yield is 1.015294% - 1 = 0.7618%, and the annual yield on a
semiannual bond basis is 2 x 0.7618% = 1.5236%.
